sheet.name: en
sheet.text: I, along with Ringo and the others, have a mission to fulfill.
We must track down that mysterious Marle.
Ah, that's right. I should introduce you. Ringo, Amitie, Arle...
She's the highly competent first mate of the SS Tetra.
I'm the super cute AND highly competent first mate of the SS Tetra!
Ess can be a bit... opinionated, but she's really—
I may have just met Ess...
But I can already tell there's more to her beneath the surface.
Deep down, she's just a lonely, sweet girl!
Yeah, I'm getting that vibe, too. How about you, Carby?
She speaks her mind, and that takes guts!
I hope you're all having a wonderful time analyzing my personality.
I bet you think you have me ALL figured out, don't you?
You have NO idea what I had to go through!
First, that good-for-nothing Keeper of Dimensions comes and snatches you up!
Then I lose contact with O...
Then you, Captain I'm-So-Boring-I- Make-Dirt-Exciting, just show up out of nowhere!
Meanwhile, I had to go through SO much just to get here!
I'm sorry, Ess. I didn't mean to make you feel so lonely.
Tee, I think I need to knock some sense into you!
*chuckle* Well, at least you're not feeling lonely anymore.
I want to battle, and I want it NOW!
You're lucky I'm not only cute, but also ridiculously generous.
So, this mysterious person you're all after... This Marle...
I guess I'll help you find her.
I mean, if we don't do anything, nothing's gonna get fixed, right?
Doesn't really sound like we have a choice.
Yaaaaay~! This is SO cool! Isn't it, Ringo?
Well, better drag everyone else out of the SS Tetra.
Does that mean we get to go on the starship!?
So let's hurry up and go!
Don't forget we've got a job to do, okay?
*ahem* Forgive me for my silence. I've been contemplating our situation.
I believe it's in our best interest if Maguro and I stay behind.
There's still a substantial amount of data to analyze if we aim to learn anything.
I gotta say, I'm pretty curious about the starship myself.
I'll be way more useful here! ★
Maguro, Ris. You guys are the best!
Just you wait! We'll assemble a team of superstars!
I can't believe it! It's finally happening!
You're on board the SS Tetra, so show a little respect!
...Didn't she call this ship a tin can earlier? Anyway, I can totally see why Ringo's so excited.
This place is unreal! I've never seen anything like it!
It's like something straight out of a sci-fi movie!
So do you and the others live on the ship, Ess?
I guess you could say that.
You're so lucky! I wish I had your life!
To me and the others, it's just a plain old ship.
But if you're THAT interested in it, I suppose I could show you around.
Yay! You really ARE generous, Ess!
First off, this is the common area.
This is where the crew gathers for meetings.
...we take part in some training exercises.
So you and the others train like this all the time?
You're distracting me! I don't have time for games!
I have actual life-and-death matters to tend to, you know!
For your information, I have a VERY important hug I need to deliver!
You take over from here, Tee!
She sure was in a hurry. I hope she's okay.
I have a pretty good idea of where she ran off to.
Of course. Anyway, let's get back to business.
I'd like you to meet the SS Tetra's crew.
Everything that feeds the crew grows here.
It's also a fantastic spot to unwind and have a nice, relaxing walk.
I could've sworn I just saw a chihuahua in a swanky outfit pass by just now.
It was sprinting at full speed on two legs! And it was howling the whole time!
Does this not sound insane to anyone else!?
We haven't even done anything to you today!
Yeah! We haven't shoved your head in a bucket, and it's already WAY after breakfast!
AND we didn't slip a single firecracker under the door while you were in the bathroom!
AAAND did you find any rocks in your food today? I don't think so!
As if enough wasn't going on already.
Now we've got these hyper kids running around...
They kinda look alike! And they're in perfect sync!
Well, it sounds like they miiight be borderline psychopaths.
*annoyed grunt* I suppose introductions will have to wait.
Jay! Elle! You two were up to no good again, weren't you?
Hey, it's Tee! Why do you look mad?
Ai ran by earlier, and he was much more agitated than usual.
Were you two pulling pranks on him again!?
We said we haven't done anything wrong today!
It wasn't me or Jay that Ai was running away from!
Is there something you'd like to share with me, then?
Why should we tell you if you won't believe us anyway?
Why should we tell you if you won't play with us?
But it sure was fun, Jay!
Aaanyway, this here is Jay, and this one's Elle.
They're members of the ship's crew.
Wow, I didn't know we had so much company! I'm Jay!
And I'm Elle! Nice to meet you!
...As you might've noticed, they can be a bit of a handful.
However, when they hold hands, a mysterious power causes their senses to heighten.
They've saved the SS Tetra and its crew countless times.
What was Ai so scared of?
He said something about an "eerie presence" on the ship.
Do you think he was talking about us?
I don't think so. What do you think, Elle?
No, I don't think so either, Jay.
What Ai was describing was more like...
Someone with an intense and eerie aura...
Go find Ai! He can tell you everything!
Go find Ai! He's the one who was there!
There he is! That's a tight spot he's hiding in. And boy, is he shaking!
He's the SS Tetra's chief engineer.
How does your ship stay afloat?
He's a bit jumpy sometimes, but he knows what he's doing.
Ai! Sorry I left you to watch the ship alone.
It's me, Tee. It's safe now.
Listen, Ai. I have some questions for you.
You want to ask him questions NOW?
Maybe only Tee understands him, kind of like with me and Carby.
Whatever spooked him has got him scared of us now, too.
You sure now's the best time to be asking him questions?
You're right. They can wait till later.
He's already afraid and confused. Now he's surrounded by unfamiliar faces.
He isn't getting any calmer! What do we do?
Well, there is one thing we haven't tried yet.
Hey, I like the way you think!
We'll battle until you come to your senses!
I apologize for losing my composure, Captain.
Indeed... It was a splendid battle, and I've returned to my senses.
I do hope I can repay you for your kindness. *dignified giggle*
It's fine, don't worry about it.
No, it's just... the difference is like night and day. He really made an impressive recovery.
It all happened so fast that I'm not even sure how to react!
No matter. I believe you had some questions for me, then?
Ai, can you tell us more about this "eerie presence" you encountered?
Hm... If I recall correctly, it was making its way to the engine room, whatever it was.
This is bad... The engine room is the heart of the SS Tetra.
Okay! We'll talk more later, Ai!
Incidentally, who were those young ladies?
I worked super hard, and I was so nice to everyone! I did such a good job!
You are a good girl, and you did a good job, Ess.
*a squeal so pure and childlike, reminiscent of a simpler time to which we can never truly return*
No, I can do so much more! I can be an even better girl! The best girl!
...Gee, my back could really use some attention.
I will now pat your back as an expression of affection.
Papaaaa! Why are you so amazing and wonderful!?
I-I didn't know she had a softer side to her.
*nervous thinking* Try not to stare... Don't make direct eye contact.
Well, this is going to be awkward...
Huh? What do you want, Tee?
Did you, um, happen to see anyone suspicious around here?
Ess has filled me in on most of the details.
Thanks, Ess. Saved us some time.
Hmph. Would you really expect less from someone as thoughtful as me?
Whooooa! The robot just talked to me!
You must be Ringo, Amitie, Arle, and Carbuncle.
My name is Zed. I am a crew member of the SS Tetra. I perform a variety of tasks on the ship.
My primary purpose is to oversee the well-being of my fellow crewmates.
I am pleased to make your acquaintance.
Wow, he's pretty polite! Right, Carby?
Zed's a very reliable crew member.
By the way, Zed. Have you seen anyone suspicious around here?
I must apologize, but I cannot recall whether or not I saw anyone.
My memories regarding this matter appear to be compromised.
It may be a minor bug.
A bug this small can be squashed with our usual procedures.
Say, Ringo, maybe you could give it a try?
You sure you're okay with me doing it?
Of course. I'm counting on you.
Besides, after watching all these battles from the sidelines...
...you must be itching to battle yourself, aren't you?
We seem to be similar in that regard, I've noticed.
Well then, I won't hold back!
You there! Zed! I'm your opponent now!
Yes, good. Let us have a nice, clean battle.
Excellent, thank you. I can now recall the event clearly.
The suspicious figure went down that corridor there.
Did you find the criminal you were chasing or what?
I wouldn't exactly use the word "criminal"...
But the one we've been tracking may be on the ship.
I wanna take a good look at their sorry mug and give 'em a piece of my mind!
And I won't rest until I do!
All right. Then I'll be counting on you, too.
Jay, Elle, and Ai have not yet fully grasped the gravity of the situation.
They are likely unaware of the danger that awaits.
I will go and explain everything to them in detail.
Oh, Papa! You're the most wonderful papa in the whole universe!
I wasn't sure whether I should ask or not, buuut...
I think I know what you're gonna ask, Ringo.
Yeah, maybe it's time to address the big mechanical elephant in the room.
You know how you kept calling Zed "Papa"?
Yeah, so? He's my papa. That's what I call him.
I mean... just look at him!
Zed's not REALLY your papa, is he?
OF COURSE HE'S REALLY MY PAPA!
Maybe the situation's a bit more complicated than we thought.
He's the only papa I have!
I really shouldn't have opened my big mouth.
You helped me reinforce something I already know in my heart.
For questioning my relationship with Papa...
O-Okay, fine! I'm sorry! Just knock it off with the death stare, will ya!?
Eeess... I said I was sorry!
Are you kidding, Tee!? You're taking sides with hat-for-hair!?
Listen, you've got it all wrong.
You and Zed have a special bond between you two.
And nothing anyone says or does can ever change that.
Okaaay... Not sure I get what's going on anymore.
But Zed's Ess's papa, I guess... Got it.
You probably shouldn't think about it too much either, Ringo.
That's just the way it is.
Hey, why are we wasting our time yapping about all this?
O! I need you for a moment.
It's time for a routine report.
This is Captain Tee of the SS Tetra.
I am broadcasting this signal via Communications Officer O.
The Constellation Zone appears quiet. No ripples in spacetime detected.
Are you seriously doing THAT again?
You give the same exact report every single day without fail.
What's the point? Does it even serve a purpose?
I never really questioned it before...
You're right. It's my duty to make a report.
...Even though there's never been any problems out here. It's so peaceful and quiet!
Tee! Apologies for appearing out of nowhere.
I need you to come with me.
You're that good-for-nothing Keeper of Dimensions! Who invited you here!?
Nice to see you, too, Ess.
But right now, there are more pressing matters at hand.
I'll have to borrow Tee and O for a bit.
Get back here, you kidnapping little... *unintelligible rage*
Did he seriously just come and snatch them up?
Ess? I have come to verify the source of the shouting.
Did something happen? Where are Tee and O?
It's horrible! Just horrible! It's the worst!
Tee and O belong to ME!
EVERYONE on the SS Tetra belongs to me!
But that jerk just took them away without even asking...
C-Calm down, Ess. Try to tell me what happened.
I know. How about a battle?
A nice battle should help ease your mind.
Do you feel better now, Ess?
Y-Yes, Papa. Thank you. I love you...
So anyway, the Keeper of Dimensions showed up out of nowhere...
He came and took Tee and O!
I am sure he had his reasons.
We can pursue them if you would like.
I'm the first mate of this ship.
But if I don't know where we're going, I can't map out a navigational chart.
O is equipped with a feature that allows him to emit location signals.
Perhaps we can follow his signal.
It's our chief engineer's time to shine!
We've searched high and low for this shady character...
There's also the possibility that this person may not even be on the ship anymore.
I'm sick of all this running around!
Gotta say, I didn't think the SS Tetra would be so big.
Have you guys been living on board for a long time?
Look, I already have a headache, so can you NOT with the ridiculous questions? You're making it worse.
Would it kill you to dial it back a bit, Ess?
Amitie, how do I put it...
Everyone on board this ship was brought here by the same person.
We've become like a family, to say the least.
Apart from the SS Tetra, we have nowhere else to go.
We enjoy our time together and keep ourselves entertained.
Well... That's good to hear, at least.
...Well, I suppose you could call it "space patrol."
Our adventures on the humble SS Tetra take us all across the vast emptiness of space.
We find and report any abnormalities through O to a specific person.
The very same person who brought us all here in the first place.
That's right, Ringo. You know him.
It's Ex, the Keeper of Dimensions.
It's just... that word sounds awfully familiar.
It looks like you're all having lots of fun. ♪
I think that's wonderful. I really do.
You! What exactly are you plotting!?
I've said it before, and I'll say it again.
With the worlds merged together, nothing can stop us from battling all we want!
Just think, we can battle for ALL eternity! What could be more fun than that? ♪
Now listen, everyone! I'll be waiting for you up ahead.
*giggle* You get to chase me after we battle some more. How fun! ♪
W-Wait! Maybe it's not such a good idea after all!
*increasingly panicked thinking sounds* I-It just isn't, okay!?
Well, I hope you come up with a better reason soon.
Seems like my time in the spotlight will have to come later. ♪
We have to go after— Hey, what the...!?
Everyone, leave this to Amitie and me!
Time to do some popping! You ready, Amitie?
When we all battled, lots of power was released.
Marle then absorbed all that power for herself.
Now it's building up inside her.
O was observing and analyzing the power released by Arle and Amitie.
It means that the more we use our abilities and spells in battle...
That's cheating! Is that what she really wants? Power!?
But... But it's not like we can just stop battling!
What's she planning to do with all the power she's gathering?
Only one way to find out! Let's catch up to her!
Hm... I thought I felt the SS Tetra shaking a few moments ago.
If something were amiss, Tee would call for me right away.
I am the chief engineer, after all...
Ess! Zed! Wh-What is it? You nearly gave me a heart attack!
You know that tracking device you're always so proud of?
Well, I need you to use it and pinpoint O's location!
If you're looking for O, he was on his way to the cockpit.
That Keeper of Dumb Suspenders took them!
...the SS Tetra is without a captain.
Affirmative. However, with your help, we can certainly—
He is only panicking because Tee is the glue that holds the crew together.
*scoff* Except glue has way more personality than Tee.
It is only natural that anxiety ensues without his presence.
Yeah, well, if he keeps this up, he'll just fall apart completely.
Come on, Ai! Get it together!
*ahem* So, I have my trusty tracking pendulum here.
I can use it to locate O, if you'd like.
Yes, I would! And make it quick!
We are counting on you, Ai.
What's this? He appears to be... warping to a distant world...
I'm quite familiar with everything within the Constellation Zone.
Yet his destination seems to extend far beyond that...
Perhaps to understand something mysterious, we must use a mysterious power of our own.
I think I get what you mean... You want to use the twins!
Whether it will work or not is another story.
Oh, any idea you have will definitely work, Papa!
You're much quicker than I expected. ♪
We know what you're capable of!
You're absorbing the power that's released whenever anyone battles!
That's what you've been up to!
Is that really what I've been doing?
I see. So that's what's going on...
Tee! Don't let your guard down!
Let's put this whole power-absorbing theory aside for now.
What I want is the fun you all share with each other.
But... then our worlds will be all mishmashed together, right?
Everything will be fun forever this way.
Just look at her! Isn't it obvious?
She's not having fun at all!
We've been all over the place, seen all sorts of things...
I've seen enough to trust my gut. And my gut says you're not really having fun!
You keep messing with everyone's heads and running off.
You're forcing our worlds to merge AND forcing everyone to battle.
Something tells me you're not doing this because you want to.
That's why I think this whole "fun" thing is a bunch of baloney!
Hey, I think you're starting to get through to her!
How could you... say such things...?
Just listen, okay? Just listen! I'll tell you what fun is all about!
When you have fun, you're supposed to be relaxed, excited, dazzled...
You're SO creepy about it! And I can tell it's 'cause you don't think what you're doing is fun!
And that just breaks my heart!
It's spewing nonsense. Try shutting it.
I happen to think this is PLENTY of fun! *ruthless giggle*
I wouldn't get in my way if I were you...
It seems you're finally showing your true colors.
Yes, that's right... This is going to be SO FUN!
Is that the only word you know!?
I'll need backup, everyone! It's time to battle, Marle!
I told you that'd be fun!
P-Please. Tell me you had fun.
I can say that much for sure!
We should have a battle that's actually fun!
Of course. I nearly forgot what kind of person you are.
But I can't... It's not allowed...
Guess we're back to square one.
At least now we know what we're dealing with.
Yeah, you're right. We'll get her next time for sure.
Tell me, how exactly is that "fun," as you keep putting it?
What's fun is fun! Why's that so hard to understand!?
Battles ARE fun! You said so yourselves! Am I wrong!?
I've had enough of this. I'm leaving.
Next time I see you, I expect you to be much, much stronger.
Because if you're not, I promise... I'll crush you into dust!
Was it really only a C+ performance? ...A-Anyway, back to square one.
Look like you're right, O. No sign of her.
Where do we even begin to look for her now...?
Looks like you're in a pickle.
And pickles are too sour. What you need is a healthy dose of sugar.
I've got candies, jellies, macarons, cream puffs... Uh, what else...
Is this a friend of yours, Amitie?
We're from the same world. He's super strong!
I was getting the sense that something wasn't right in the world.
So I decided to do a little investigating.
But before I knew it, I somehow got warped here.
Lemreeeees! Oh my gosh, where do I start...
Afraid it'll have to wait, Amitie.
I've got some bad news, unfortunately.
I don't know about you, Carby, but I have a bad feeling about this.
All I know is that you're involved in the Primp incident.
So if you don't mind, I'll need you to come with me.
Sorry to spring this on you.
But time is of the essence, ya know?
Let's get everyone together first, then I'll fill you in on what's going on.
Uh, what are you all doing?
Uh, why are you all here together?
But we really need you to take this serious—
Of course not! This is an emergency!
We know, we know. Tee's gone, right?
We know, we know. O's gone, too, right?
If you knew, why wait until later? What could be more important?
Tee and O are beyond my tracking device's range.
But you two hold a mysterious power that's activated when you hold hands.
Can you use it to locate Tee and O?
You did!? What did you find out?
Maybe we'll tell if you battle us!
Maybe we'll tell if you beat us!
Jay and Elle may require our support.
They are scanning the cosmos for Tee and O with everything their tiny bodies can muster.
Perhaps a battle will put them at ease and help them focus.
Are you two actually worried about Tee and O?
We never said we WEREN'T worried!
Let's do this, you little troublemakers!
Hm. Between the location Jay and Elle determined...
...and the results from my tracking device...
...this must be where Tee and O are.
This location is far more remote than we could have anticipated.
Regardless, the information came from a reliable source.
That's where Tee and O are!
Well, kinda hard not to be. I've never done this before.
I have no idea what's waiting for us out there...
Do you have ANY idea how worried we were!? Well!? Are you just gonna stand there!?
Hold on, Ess. This is not Tee.
Tee asked for it some time ago.
Ai and I have been working on it ever since.
It's so that we can communicate with each other even when we're apart.
Even as far as the edge of spacetime...
I never thought I'd be using it like this.
But if you battle this version of Tee, it should help you.
Wait, I can battle this thing!?
Of course. Zed and I were the ones who created it, after all.
Listen up, Tee! Once we find you, you're gonna get what's coming!
I'm gonna kick the snot out of you!
Just wait until you see how strong I REALLY am!
Would you like me to put you down for a nap?
No, Papa! I'm feeling much better now!
Besides, we have too much to do and no time to waste!
Ess... You're positively glowing right now.
By the power bestowed upon me as the SS Tetra's highly, highly respected first mate...
...I'll guide us to our destination, uncharted territory be darned!
Some folks call me the comet warlock.
That was really something, wasn't it?
When we all combined our powers together!
Yeah! I wanna do it again!
But not like last time. Things got a little... wild.
If we're going to practice, then I want to do it right next time.
Then in that case, allow me to help.
I still have a lot to learn from that particular battle style.
The more I practice, the more I'll grow accustomed to it.
So you want to practice with us, Tee?
Normally, I'd go all out on opponents who pose a threat.
But since you're ladies, I promise I'll go easy on you.
Oh, really now? You sure you don't wanna take that back?
You're all quite formidable! Especially with your powers combined!
Any of this seem familiar to you?
Nope! That battle was my first time seeing this!
But then again, all this stuff feels awfully familiar...
At any rate, now I'm confident that I can count on all of you.
Anytime we come across a powerful enemy, we just need to combine our abilities.
Yeah! This is some awesome stuff. What do you think, Arle?
Do NOT call me that. Actually, don't talk to me at all.
Did you know you can help out your friends during battles?
What do you not understand about "don't talk to me"!?
Wait... So you DIDN'T know you could help?
It's simple! You just have to... do that one thing...
Right, right! You know the thing!
Then we should get some practice in.
I wonder what your power is like, Ess.
Yeah! You said you knew how to do the thing!
You DO know what you're doing, right?
Yeah, sure. I'll help you out.
Uh, okay! H-Hope you're ready, 'cause I totally am!
See how much stronger we were?
It helps a whole lot when we all work together! ♪
Agreed. It'll come in handy for the challenges ahead.
Our opponents will be much tougher as we move forward.
Whatever. Can we just hurry up already!?
Yeesh... Did I make her mad again?
